mapper.insert: insert into song (id, name, type, description) value (null, #{name}, #{type}, #{description})
mapper.select: select song_ID, song_name, singer_name, album_name from song, singer, album where song.singer_ID = singer.singer_ID and song.album_ID = album.album_ID and examine != 0
select song_ID, song_name, singer_name, album_name, created_time from song, singer, album where examine = 0 and song.singer_ID = singer.singer_ID and song.album_ID = album.album_ID
select song_ID, song_name, singer_name, album_name, created_time from song, singer, album where examine = -1 and song.singer_ID = singer.singer_ID and song.album_ID = album.album_ID
